timeline.author: jameskleeh

timeline.bodyText: Removing this check doesn't seem correct. The previous calls mirrorToClassElement could have returned null
timeline.author: jameskleeh

timeline.bodyText: Removing this check doesn't seem correct. The previous call to mirrorToClassElement could have returned null
timeline.author: jameskleeh

timeline.bodyText: This also doesn't make sense to me. If the call returns null it shouldn't be put into the map with a null value
timeline.author: jameskleeh

timeline.bodyText: What is the reasoning for this change?
timeline.author: jameskleeh

replies.bodyText:
beanAnnotationMetadata  is not used.
Is the call mandatory?
replies.author: croudet

replies.bodyText: The only thing it will do is initialize the annotation metadata, which should not need done at that point in time. You can try removing the call and see if the build passes
replies.author: jameskleeh
